comments.body: This also looks like it could just be `IO ()`. Not necessarily opposed to making it an existential but I’d like a comment explaining the design decision.

Not sure in what sense it could be IO. You could lift the NotificationMessage outside this function, but then my concern is people might pattern match and fail outside a tracked context. My plan is to add exception handlers at some point.
Sounds reasonable, :+1: on using existentials for this then.
